originalText.text:
I have known Michael Farber and his partners at Farber, Schneider & Ferrari, Dan Schneider, Mike Ferrari, and Sarena Townsend for some years now. They are, without a doubt, some of the most caring brilliant lawyers in all of New York. Whether your legal challenge is a business dispute, a real estate issue, or a criminal matter, they are the go to lawyers. As a fellow attorney, I recommend them without reservation!
Jose Anibal Baez

originalText.text: I had the privilege to have Farber Schneider Ferrari LLP represent me in multiple matters including litigation and other platforms such as real estate, startup advice and general questions to address challenges. I have worked with Daniel J. Schneider for years and he has been an integral part of allowing me to get answers where nothing was ‘sugar coated’.  He was straight forward and told me what to expect each step of the way. He is knowledgeable, patient, responsive and is hardworking. Daniel will go far beyond what you  expect from a lawyer.  Additionally, I also had the pleasure to work with Michael S. Farber who has helped me in matters with a reassuring, articulate and straight forward way. I have introduced colleagues to the firm who corroborate my dealings; and were as impressed with their responsiveness and cost-effective rates. Integrity, know-how and most importantly, a service oriented approach.  I would highly recommend them for any situation you are in or maybe facing. Craig Stone

originalText.text:
A Stellar Experience!

I had the pleasure of working with Farber Schneider Ferrari LLP for my business litigation case. Their professionalism, timeliness, and expertise were truly remarkable. From the beginning, they instilled confidence in me and treated my case with the utmost care.

The entire team demonstrated exceptional professionalism, being attentive and responsive to my needs. They took the time to understand my case and the legal issues involved. Their timeliness was impeccable, meeting deadlines and efficiently organizing court appearances.

The firm's expertise in business litigation was evident throughout the process. They navigated the complexities of the case with finesse, developing a solid legal strategy and providing sound advice. Their knowledge and experience were showcased in the courtroom, presenting compelling arguments.

Moreover, their dedication went beyond expectations. They provided regular updates, explained legal concepts clearly, and fostered trust and collaboration. I highly recommend this litigation firm for their proficient and professional approach, they exceeded my expectations and I am immensely grateful for their invaluable support.

originalText.text: I am a business owner and have been party to various litigation in the business and IP spheres.  FSF is a team of knowledgeable, experienced counsel providing rational solutions I can very strongly recommend. I have worked with attorneys of varying levels and this firm is the real deal. Very comfortable heading into the most heated battles with this firm at my side.

originalText.text: As an attorney, FARBER SCHNEIDER FERRARI LLP is a trusted resource.  When one of my clients has a problem that is beyond my area of practice, these folks are my go-to problem solvers.
